alert.note: Alert for Hall; Lumpkin; Towns; Union; White (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 6:59PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Towns, northeastern Lumpkin, White, northern Hall and eastern Union Counties through 730 PM EDT... At 659 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Young Harris to near Porter Springs, and moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Dahlonega, Cleveland, Hiawassee, Blairsville, Young Harris, Clermont, Helen, Suches, Unicoi State Park, Robertstown, Blue Mountain Shelter, Gumlog, Mossy Creek, Titus, Woods Hole Shelter, Low Gap Shelter, Vogel State Park, Anna Ruby Falls, Leaf and Plum Orchard Gap Shelter. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for north central and northeastern Georgia.
